Yonatan Lourie blog

Yonatan Lourie (under maintenance)

I'm Yonatan, a grad student at Tel Aviv University (TAU), specializing in Statistics and Data Science. In addition to my studies, I'm also gaining practical experience as a part of the data science team at Forter. I like to apply machine learning, statistics, and data analysis to solve hard problems. I like to learn how to use new technologies while focusing in Python, R, Spark, SQL, Elasticsearch, Git, Docker, Jenkins and more.
